snippet.title: Dragon Quest VII - Overview Trailer (Nintendo 3DS)
snippet.description:
Dragon Quest VII: Fragments of the Forgotten Past comes to Nintendo 3DS on 16th September.

Official Website: http://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-3DS/DRAGON-QUEST-VII-Fragments-of-the-Forgotten-Past-1114170.html?utm_medium=social&utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=dragonquestvii&utm_content=overviewtrailer

Twitter Nintendo UK: https://twitter.com/NintendoUK
Twitch Nintendo UK: https://twitch.tv/NintendoUK
Instagram Nintendo UK: https://instagram.com/NintendoUK
YouTube Nintendo UK: http://ow.ly/pcJxF
